channel.title: [SCRATCH] RS2 Project
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER]This is a new project from scratch by Canownueasy & Faab234.
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/thestory.png[/img]
[b]The Objective[/b] The objective is to conquer all the cities with your Group, Train your Skills, Own Shops, Own NPCs, Create Houses, and become higher,
[b]Conquer a city[/b] Go to the City, you wan't conquer, Kill Every People of the City.
How to Win: [list] [*]Kill the King [*]Change the Flag to your Flag (Half City must be Killed) [*]Killed all People [/list]
[b]Peace[/b] You can make peace with another group, You can fight with them to a City, If Your Groups Conquers a City with a other Group, The city for both groups. If you have peace with a other group, You can buy from they shops, go to the city of that group, You can teleport there, And if you die there, You don't loose your stuff.
[b]The King:[/b] The King is a Special Rank, If you are king, You own a City. You can add objects, Change the Login message, Create UserGroups, Promote Users, Send Message to All your Players, You can add NPCs as Guards, Add and Start Dropparty's.
[b]The King's helpers:[/b] The Helpers helps the King. Helpers have More Powers than Default users, like Send a Message, Or Add NPCs/Objects, And Much More. Add and Start Dropparty's.
[b]Other UserGroups:[/b] Other UserGroups can Train they skills in the City, They can Earn GP, by doing Work. They can fight to Other Cities.
[i]Builders[/i] Builders create Houses, and the Interior of a House, They will earn money on every house.
Special Options: [list] [*]Spawn House Objects [*]Spawn House Items [/list]
[i]Woodcutters[/i] Woodcutters, Cut the Wood. They add Wood to Woodcut Shop. They will Earn money for every Log.
Special Options: [list] [*]Free Woodcutting Items [/list]
[i]Smithing[/i] They make the Armour for Every Player.
Special Options: [list] [*]Workhouse [*]Own Shop [*]Own NPC [/list]
[i]Mining[/i] They Working on the Mining Skill, They can Sell the Ores to a Ore Shop or a Smithing Worker
Special Options: [list] [*]Free Stuff [/list]
[i]Fighters[/i] They Fight with People, They Get money on Every Kill. They may keep Drops.
Special Options: [list] [*]Nothing [/list]
[i]Vicar[/i] They can give People more Prayer power, and they can go to the graveyard, if they click on a gravestone, they get Prayer Points.
Special Options: [list] [*]Heal Players (20 - 50 HP) [/list]
[i]Hunter[/i] They can catch animals and They can sell Animals in they Shop.
Special Options: [list] [*]Own Shop [*]Free Animals [*]Catch Summoning Monsters in a Fight. [*]Own NPC [/list]
[i] Thief or Spy[/i] They go to a Other City and they Steal from Shops. But if you're Killed, You're on the Blacklist for one Hour in that city.
Special Options: [list] [*]Keep the Stolen Items [*]keep the Money [/list]
[i]Fisher[/i] They Fish for fish and they can Cook and Sell it.
Special Options: [list] [*]Own Shop [*]Own NPC [/list]
[i]Herblorist[/i] You can make Potions and can sell it in your Shop.
Special Options: [list] [*]Own Shop [*]Own NPC [/list]
[b]Army[/b] The Army is a Usergroup, In the army of the City, we have different ranks.
[list] [*]General [*]Colonel [*]Major [*]Captain [*]Lieutenant [*]Sergeant [*]Corporal [*]Soldier [*]City Command
[/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/features.png[/img] [list] [*]Summoning have more Features, You Can Spawn ± Every NPC, and They can Fight [*]Workers, You don't need to fight, You can do work like Smiting to make Weapons for your City. [*]Workers have they own Shop. [*]Workers have they own Work House [*]The King have his own House [*]Grand Exchange [/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/minigames.png[/img] You can play minigames with People from Other Cities. This are the Minigames:
[list] [*]BountyHunter [*]Castlewars [*]PestControl [*]Magebank [*]Maybe Fist of Ghutix. [*]Barbarian assault [*]TzHaar fight pit [*]TzHaar fight cave [*]Clan wars [/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/activities.png[/img] [list] [*]Barrows [*]Maybe Pyramid plunder [/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/skills.png[/img] [list] [*]Agility [*]Cooking [*]Firemaking [*]Fletching [*]Hunter [*]Melee [*]Prayer [*]Prayer [*]Runecrafting [*]Smithing [*]Thieving [*]Construction [*]Crafting [*]Farming [*]Fishing [*]Herblore [*]Magic [*]Mining [*]Ranged [*]Slayer [*]Summoning [*]Woodcutting [/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/rs2pro.png[/img] [list] [*]Update Server (508) ✔ [*]Login ✔ [*]Rendering ✔ [*]No Process ✔ [*]Chat ✔ [*]EventManager ✔ [*]Player ✔ [*]NPC [*]Combat [*]NPCCombat [*]NPCSpawning [*]ClientToServer Packets ✔ [*]ServerToClient Packets ✔ [*]Login Packets ✔ [*]Item [*]Walking[/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/updatelog.png[/img]
[b]Website Features:[/b] [list] [*]Homepage [*]Forums [*]Banning and IP banning from the Website [*]MySQL [*]Uploading Media [*]Buy Items [*]Change Location (Admin or Buy) [*]sendMessage (With PHP Socket) [*]More Things [/list]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/media.png[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/jiolf5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/r9hr3q.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://faab234.comule.com/contact.png[/img] Faab234: [email]Faab234@hotmail.com[/email] Canownueasy´: [email]tgpn1996@hotmail.com[/email] RS2Project: [email]rs2project@hotmail.com[/email]
[b]Applications:[/b]
[b]Open Applications:[/b] [list] [*]Programmer 3. [*]Beta tester 4 [*]Beta tester 5 [/list]
[b]Team:[/b] Programmers: [list][*]Faab234 [*]Canownueasy´ [/list]
GFX'ers: [list][*]Smudge [*]ph3er my dds[/list]
Webdesigners: [list][*]Faab234 [*]Smugde [*][/list]
Beta Testers: [list][*]Kingdomkey01 [*]Rise Against [*]Arkon[/list] [/CENTER][/ul]

item.title: [SCRATCH] RS2 Project
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Apps-

Programmer 3:
I have been programming Java for about 3 years now, HTML & JavaScript for almost 5 years, and PHP & CSS for almost a half year. I’d love to help out with this project. I was recently making my own base (Similar to Delta, but with less lag). My theory was that the longer a process had to search for another process in any file, it would create more lag on the server.
Therefore, i had the basics of every file in it, and the rest were custom classes that were zipped, creating even less lag.

Beta tester 4:
Beta testing sounds fun I’d love to help out with this aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: [SCRATCH] RS2 Project
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Shilo Village, post:11, topic:350843”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=447196.msg3282921#msg3282921 date=1279996265]

So you plan to split each area into a region and let a selective amount of people own that? How do you plan to manage each players region request? What if someone wants to change their region and become part of someone elses?

They aren’t by regions. It’s like Ardougne, Varrock, Lumbridge. Since the max players is 2000 it will work out well

But you will have to develop a classing system which you would have to split each city into a region so that players stepping into other peoples cities can be killed.
[/quote]

What’s so hard using location tiles?

boolean varrock() { return absX >= x && absX <= x && absY >= x && absY <= x; }[/quote]

Please don’t tell me that’s how you’re going to handle every region.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:

So you plan to split each area into a region and let a selective amount of people own that? How do you plan to manage each players region request? What if someone wants to change their region and become part of someone elses?

They aren’t by regions. It’s like Ardougne, Varrock, Lumbridge. Since the max players is 2000 it will work out well

But you will have to develop a classing system which you would have to split each city into a region so that players stepping into other peoples cities can be killed.
[/quote]

What’s so hard using location tiles?

boolean varrock() { return absX >= x && absX <= x && absY >= x && absY <= x; }[/quote]

That was not my original question?

Read full topic

item.title: [SCRATCH] RS2 Project
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[quote=“Phrosteh, post:6, topic:350843”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=447196.msg3282144#msg3282144 date=1279940827]

Sounds like a brilliant idea. So in other words, a king is a regional administrator?

Yes. And each user can be identified by their crowns and right clicking on them.
[/quote]Sounds like WoW.

Exactly what I was thinking …
Anyways, are you going to allow an infinite amount of guards, etc. a person can build?[/quote]

Not quite. There will be selective data held by each player to prevent and overtime “overload” of guards and ect.

By the way, just made an Infraction system.
You can do:

player.getInfractionManager().addInfraction(Infraction.MUTE);

Read full topic

item.title: [SCRATCH] RS2 Project
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[ul][CENTER]This is a new project from scratch by Canownueasy & Faab234.

The Objective
The objective is to conquer all the cities with your Group, Train your Skills, Own Shops, Own NPCs, Create Houses, and become higher,

Conquer a city
Go to the City, you wan’t conquer, Kill Every People of the City.

How to Win:
[list]
[]Kill the King
[]Change the Flag to your Flag (Half City must be Killed)
[*]Killed all People
[/list]

Peace
You can make peace with another group, You can fight with them to a City, If Your Groups Conquers a City with a other Group, The city for both groups.
If you have peace with a other group, You can buy from they shops, go to the city of that group, You can teleport there, And if you die there, You don’t loose your stuff.

The King:
The King is a Special Rank, If you are king, You own a City. You can add objects, Change the Login message, Create UserGroups, Promote Users, Send Message to All your Players, You can add NPCs as Guards, Add and Start Dropparty’s.

The King’s helpers:
The Helpers helps the King. Helpers have More Powers than Default users, like Send a Message, Or Add NPCs/Objects, And Much More. Add and Start Dropparty’s.

Other UserGroups:
Other UserGroups can Train they skills in the City, They can Earn GP, by doing Work. They can fight to Other Cities.

Builders
Builders create Houses, and the Interior of a House, They will earn money on every house.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Spawn House Objects
[]Spawn House Items
[/list]

Woodcutters
Woodcutters, Cut the Wood. They add Wood to Woodcut Shop. They will Earn money for every Log.

Special Options:
[list]
[*]Free Woodcutting Items
[/list]

Smithing
They make the Armour for Every Player.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Workhouse
[]Own Shop
[*]Own NPC
[/list]

Mining
They Working on the Mining Skill, They can Sell the Ores to a Ore Shop or a Smithing Worker

Special Options:
[list]
[*]Free Stuff
[/list]

Fighters
They Fight with People, They Get money on Every Kill. They may keep Drops.

Special Options:
[list]
[*]Nothing
[/list]

Vicar
They can give People more Prayer power, and they can go to the graveyard, if they click on a gravestone, they get Prayer Points.

Special Options:
[list]
[*]Heal Players (20 - 50 HP)
[/list]

Hunter
They can catch animals and They can sell Animals in they Shop.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Own Shop
[]Free Animals
[]Catch Summoning Monsters in a Fight.
[]Own NPC
[/list]

Thief or Spy
They go to a Other City and they Steal from Shops. But if you’re Killed, You’re on the Blacklist for one Hour in that city.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Keep the Stolen Items
[]keep the Money
[/list]

Fisher
They Fish for fish and they can Cook and Sell it.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Own Shop
[]Own NPC
[/list]

Herblorist
You can make Potions and can sell it in your Shop.

Special Options:
[list]
[]Own Shop
[]Own NPC
[/list]

Army
The Army is a Usergroup, In the army of the City, we have different ranks.

[list]
[]General
[]Colonel
[]Major
[]Captain
[]Lieutenant
[]Sergeant
[]Corporal
[]Soldier
[*]City Command

[/list]


[list]
[]Summoning have more Features, You Can Spawn ± Every NPC, and They can Fight
[]Workers, You don’t need to fight, You can do work like Smiting to make Weapons for your City.
[]Workers have they own Shop.
[]Workers have they own Work House
[]The King have his own House
[]Grand Exchange
[/list]


You can play minigames with People from Other Cities. This are the Minigames:

[list]
[]BountyHunter
[]Castlewars
[]PestControl
[]Magebank
[]Maybe Fist of Ghutix.
[]Barbarian assault
[]TzHaar fight pit
[]TzHaar fight cave
[*]Clan wars
[/list]


[list]
[]Barrows
[]Maybe Pyramid plunder
[/list]


[list]
[]Agility
[]Cooking
[]Firemaking
[]Fletching
[]Hunter
[]Melee
[]Prayer
[]Prayer
[]Runecrafting
[]Smithing
[]Thieving
[]Construction
[]Crafting
[]Farming
[]Fishing
[]Herblore
[]Magic
[]Mining
[]Ranged
[]Slayer
[]Summoning
[]Woodcutting
[/list]


[list]
[]Update Server (508)
[]Login
[]Rendering
[]No Process
[]Chat
[]EventManager
[]Player
[]NPC
[]Combat
[]NPCCombat
[]NPCSpawning
[]ClientToServer Packets
[]ServerToClient Packets
[]Login Packets
[]Item
[]Walking[/list]

Website Features:
[list]
[]Homepage
[]Forums
[]Banning and IP banning from the Website
[]MySQL
[]Uploading Media
[]Buy Items
[]Change Location (Admin or Buy)
[]sendMessage (With PHP Socket)
[*]More Things
[/list]
